BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/retailer-cpt-ecom-store-ctl/lake/2023-08-01-02-14-17/"
STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/retailer-cpt-ecom-store-ctl/stage/"
TARGET_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH = "opco/{opco}/domain/store/retailer-cpt-ecom-store-ctl/master/"
KEY_COL="ecom_stor_id"
VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD = 2
VAL_COL_CNT_THRESHOLD= 1
VAL_COL_LST=["ecom_stor_id"]
COL_NAME="opco_id"
COL_VAl= [ 'HNFD', 'FDLN', 'GNTL', 'GNTC', 'MRTN', 'STSH', 'PPOD','HANF']
OPCO_LST = ["ppod", "fdln", "hnfd", "stsh", "gntl", "gntc", "mrtn"]

logger.info("******************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - STORE - RETAILER - CPT_STOR_ZIP - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*****************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH))
logger.info("\t STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH))
logger.info("\t OPCO_LST : {0}".format(OPCO_LST))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("\t VAL_COL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_COL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("\t VAL_COL_LST : {0}".format(VAL_COL_LST))
logger.info("\t COL_NAME : {0}".format(COL_NAME))
logger.info("\t COL_VAl : {0}".format(COL_VAl))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, DoubleType, StringType,TimestampType, IntegerType, LongType, DecimalType, BooleanType, DateType, ArrayType

STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_SCHEMA = StructType([
    StructField("ecom_stor_id", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("stor_stat_cd", StringType(), True),
    StructField("stor_type_cd", StringType(), True),
    StructField("ecom_stor_name_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("pma_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("dc_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("opco_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("mgr_name_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("mgr_mail_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("cpn_vend_dc_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("cpn_vend_stat_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("max_days_out_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("time_diff_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("root_menu_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("max_prev_ord_qy", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("max_pers_it_qy", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("max_pers_hdr_qy", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("cnsm_ord_lim_qy", DecimalType(38,18), True),   
    StructField("mrch_ord_lim_qy", DecimalType(38,18), True),
    StructField("rtlr_card_actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("rtlr_card_name_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("rtlr_card_vald_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("rtlr_card_asgn_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("rtlr_card_asgn_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("rtlr_card_trk_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("tot_svgs_actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("tot_svgs_disp_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("cpn_cart_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("cpn_cart_crs_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("cpn_cart_wkly_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("cpn_cart_max_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("cpn_shlf_cat_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("cpn_shlf_max_qy", IntegerType(),False),
    StructField("cpn_wkly_spec_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("cpn_all_spec_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("dpg_shlf_cat_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("fav_psn_tab_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("fav_purc_tab_tx", StringType(), True),
    StructField("fav_rfsh_day_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("new_ariv_days_qy", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("rte_eta_actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("rte_eta_auth_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("drvr_tip_allw_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("epmt_feat_actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("epmt_disc_actv_cd", StringType(),False),
    StructField("epmt_disc_qy", DecimalType(38,18),False),
    StructField("epmt_time_ord_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("uprm_actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("it_trk_actv_cd", StringType(),False),
    StructField("shlf_it_disp_sm_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("shlf_it_disp_lg_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("list_it_disp_sm_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("list_it_disp_lg_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("pa_actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("pa_csv_req_cd", StringType(),False),
    StructField("pa_cc_init_ord_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("pa_cc_ord_days_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("pa_cc_evry_ord_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("pa_auth_days_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("cnsm_fuel_qy", DecimalType(38,18), True),
    StructField("mrch_fuel_qy", DecimalType(38,18), True),
    StructField("unat_slot_allw_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("brnd_ba_qy", IntegerType(),True),
    StructField("cpn_ba_qy", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("pr_exp_day_out_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("csi_actv_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("elec_invc_cd", StringType(),False),
    StructField("snal_mail_cpn_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("web_domn_rtrn_tx", StringType(),True),
    StructField("pup_srch_rad_qy", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("rvw_grp_cd", StringType(), True),
    StructField("ord_stat_actv_cd", StringType(),False),
    StructField("ord_stat_stop_qy", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("show_reg_pr_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("one_way_dlv_fl", StringType(),True),
    StructField("pod_bag_fl", StringType(),True),
    StructField("one_way_dlv_fee_qy", DecimalType(38,18),True),
    StructField("svc_type_slct_fl", StringType(), False),
    StructField("top_spec_actv_fl", StringType(),False),
    StructField("load_cpn_actv_fl", StringType(), False),
    StructField("stag_only_fl", StringType(),False),
    StructField("drvr_rvw_allw_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("ortc_stor_fl", StringType(),False),
    StructField("audt_cr_dt_tm", TimestampType(), True),
    StructField("audt_upd_dt_tm", TimestampType(), True),
    StructField("audt_cr_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("audt_upd_id", StringType(), True),
    StructField("stor_id", StringType(), False)    
])
logger.debug("schema-defination : Defined the schema for retailer:cpt_stor_zip.\n {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_SCHEMA))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp,lit

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH )):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH , recurse = True)
    logger.info("Purging data from STG container {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH))


df_ecom_stor_ctl_lake = spark \
                    .read \
                    .format("parquet") \
                    .schema(STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_SCHEMA) \
                    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH ) \
                    .withColumnRenamed("audt_cr_dt_tm", "src_audt_cr_dt_tm") \
                    .withColumnRenamed("audt_cr_id", "src_audt_cr_id") \
                    .withColumnRenamed("audt_upd_dt_tm", "src_audt_upd_dt_tm") \
                    .withColumnRenamed("audt_upd_id", "src_audt_upd_id") \
                    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
                    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
                    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) \
                    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) \

df_ecom_stor_ctl_lake\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .format("delta") \
        .option("inferSchema", "True") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH )
logger.info("stg-load: Created STG data from lake source. \n LAKE = {0} \n STG = {1} \n CNT = {2}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH, STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH, df_ecom_stor_ctl_lake.count()))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import count_distinct, col


def load_master_data(df_stage, path, opco):
    df_stage\
            .sort(KEY_COL) \
            .write \
            .option("mergeSchema", "True") \
            .mode("overwrite") \
            .format("delta") \
            .save(path)
    logger.info("\tRETAILER:CPT_ECOM_STORE_CTL Master data overwritten. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stage.count()))

# main starts here
for opco in OPCO_LST:
    logger.info("\n\033[1mProcessing MDM for RETAILER:CPT_ECOM_STORE_CTL - OPCO={0}\033[0m\n".format(opco))

    df_ecom_stor_ctl_stage= spark \
                            .read \
                            .format("delta") \
                            .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH)
    logger.info("\tRETAILER:CPT_ECOM_STORE_CTL loaded from stage. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_ecom_stor_ctl_stage.count()))

    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH.format(opco = opco))): 
        df_ecom_stor_ctl_master= spark \
                            .read \
                            .format("delta") \
                            .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH.format(opco = opco)) 
        logger.info("\tRETAILER:CPT_ECOM_STORE_CTL loaded from master. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_ecom_stor_ctl_master.count()))

        is_val_success= validate_count(df_ecom_stor_ctl_master,df_ecom_stor_ctl_stage,VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD)
        is_col_data_valid = unique_column_dataValidation(df_ecom_stor_ctl_master,df_ecom_stor_ctl_stage,VAL_COL_CNT_THRESHOLD,VAL_COL_LST)
        is_values_in_list= check_val_list(df_ecom_stor_ctl_stage, COL_NAME, COL_VAl)

        if (is_val_success & is_col_data_valid & is_values_in_list)== True:            
            load_master_data(df_ecom_stor_ctl_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
            
        else:
            logger.error("\t Failed to override master since threshold is exceding ")
            raise Exception("\tEXCEEDING_THRESHOLD")        
    else:
        logger.info('\tFirst Time Master Load')
        load_master_data(df_ecom_stor_ctl_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_ECOM_STORE_CTL_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
